ValidationRule.description: Lead BG should be mandatory SF#7557- Bypass BG for closing Oppty
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK(TEXT(Lead_BG__c )), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed - Cancelled by Customer')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed - Lost to Competitor')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed - Withdrawn by Nokia')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed - Obsolete')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Identify Opportunity')), OR( $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Direct_Record_Type', $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Indirect_Record_Type' ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead BG is required after "Identify Opportunity"
